name: Arrow (Demo)
description:
THE GAME

Arrow is a little addicting 2D platformer created in 48h for the 2021 Global Game Jam  (Theme: Lost & Found). It's  inspired to games like  Super Meat Boy and "rage games" like Jump King.

The game revolves around the adventures of Robino Hoodino, who has to defeat the Rodditors' Cult  while escaping their lair and save Princess Bitcoin. Only one  arrow is left in your quiver, don't forget to recover it after you shoot!

HOW TO PLAY:

Use A and D to move, Spacebar to jump and doublejump. 

LMB to charge shot /shoot

DEVELOPMENT:

We are currently developing this base concept in a complete game to release initially on Steam and, in a second moment, possibly to Switch.
The actual game will introduce new obstacles, enemies, levels and of course a  brand new story.
